description: The Front End Developer will be responsible for implementing designs into web applications, ensuring the best possible user experience, and collaborating with back-end developers to ensure seamless integration with the server-side code.
responsibilities: Implement designs into web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Ensure the best possible user experience by following responsive design principles and optimizing for performance.
Collaborate with back-end developers to ensure seamless integration with the server-side code.
Troubleshoot and debug issues that arise during development and in production.
requirements: Proven experience as a Front End Developer or similar role.
Familiarity with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and related web technologies.
Experience with front-end frameworks such as React or Angular.
experience: 2+ years of experience in front-end web development.

description: The UX Designer will be responsible for creating user-centered designs, wireframes, and prototypes that meet the needs of our clients and their customers.
responsibilities: Work with clients to understand their requirements and user needs.
Create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs that meet user needs and business objectives.
Collaborate with developers and other designers to ensure the best possible user experience.
Conduct user research and usability testing to inform design decisions.
requirements: Proven experience as a UX Designer or similar role.
Familiarity with design tools such as Sketch, Figma, or Adobe Creative Suite.
experience: 2+ years of experience in front-end web development.
